name: Lucid Dream
description: Lucid Dream is the story of little Lucy, who goes on an adventure into the world of dreams with the mission to save her mother.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 2,3 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.40 GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space
